name: ELON on MARS
description:
ELON on MARS

is the next Big Step game for our generation. Not only have we reached the Mars, but we also got a bit of “stuff cleaning” to do..

ELON on MARS

is all about Mars General Cleaning! Get rid of excessive amount of space objects flying around this cool planet by shooting them down. Different space objects cause you different level of injury so.. be aware.

  • dynamic space shooter mechanics
  • variety of danger on your way
  • truly Mars-ish aura & environment
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120920/ELON_on_MARS/
